DOC.brief_summary: The aim study adapt translate Orebro Musculoskeletal Pain Questionnaire German .
DOC.brief_title: Intercultural Adaptation Validation `` Orebro Musculoskeletal Pain Questionnaire ''
DOC.detailed_description: Participants fill questionnaire baseline three day . If questionnaire return day four participant receives reminder telephone call . Patients return questionnaire day seven dismiss . The baseline measurement do practice second measurement do patient home . To send questionnaire back participant receives prepay envelope .
DOC.criteria: Acute : Recently diagnose neck pain ( < 30 day ) Must able speak , read write German Chronic : Neck problem longer period time ( > 90 day ) Must able speak , read write German Healthy volunteer : No neck pain Must able speak , read write German Does speak , read write German `` Red Flags '' e.g . acute trauma Medical knowledge
